data.name: Amethyst Candle Holder
data.description: Amethyst has a very high spiritual vibration and is especially calming for the mind. I use it extensively in spiritual practice for meditation and healing. Amethyst is particularly well known to provide a protective shield around the aura against psychic attack or negativity. It can even be used to help a dying person make a peaceful transition.

data.name: Christmas Stocking
data.description: We wanted to make a Christmas stocking robust and big enough to be filled with goodies but also to look fabulous hanging on the fireplace as a decoration year after year. We only use good quality designer fabrics.

data.name: home sweet home sign
data.description: A beautiful stained wood sign is made from pine wood. This rustic sign adds warmth to a room tucked on a shelf or hung on the wall. Also a perfect gift for so many occasions.

data.name: Dream Catcher
data.description: The Gypsy is a free spirited dream catcher that’s name speaks for itself. The feathers and macramé hanging from the hoop flow freely in the night air, catching any bad dreams that my come across your room. By day, the Gypsy creates a noticeable positive energy that will add a sense of free spirit to your home.

data.name: Park Map
data.description: Bring together state park adventures and travels with this interactive themed push pin map to create memories that will last a lifetime. One of our Design Gurus would love to work one-on-one with you to customize this personalized interactive map which helps you keep those memories alive by displaying all of the places you’ve visited. After each trip, place a pin on the location you’ve just returned from and use the printable map tags to add photos and special moments to the map… you won’t be able to keep from smiling as you remember your favorite part of that trip, every time you see the map!

data.name: Bulbasaur Pokémon Planter
data.description: Marbled Bulbasaur planter made from Jesmonite. Jesmonite is a durable, waterproof material that looks and feels like stone. Sealed with a glossy finish.

data.name: Women's surgical scrub hats
data.description: A lightweight slouch beanie. The fabric makes it less bulky compared to traditional knitted beanies so they can be worn all year.

data.name: Trucker Hat
data.description: Got that Jeep Hair and Don't Care?! Pair it with this super cute distressed trucker hat!

data.name: Nasa Meatball
data.description: For guys who need more space.

data.name: Bunny Hat
data.description: This hat is made in two layers of fuchsia fleece. The materials are fleece, thread and wire, so it's completely vegan.
